SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractDAO<T>
A class providing CRUD operations for data access objects.
Application
Main class for launching the Orders Management Application.
Bill
Represents a bill for an order placed by a client.
BillDAO
This class provides DAO functionality for the immutable class Bill.
Client
Model class for Client entities.
ClientCardController
Controller class for managing client information displayed on a card in the UI.
ClientController
Controller class for adding new clients.
ClientDAO
This class extends AbstractDAO and serves as a DAO for managing Client objects.
ConnectionClass
The ConnectionClass class is used for establishing database connection in other classes.
Controller
Controller class for managing the application's views and their actions.
MessagePrinter
Utility class for displaying messages with a fade-out effect.
Order_
Model class for Order entities.
OrderCardController
Controller class for managing order information displayed on a card in the UI.
OrderController
Controller class for placing orders.
OrderDAO
This class extends AbstractDAO and serves as a DAO for managing Order_ objects.
Product
Model class for Product entities.
ProductCardController
Controller class for managing product information displayed on a card in the UI.
ProductController
Controller class for adding new products.
ProductDAO
This class extends AbstractDAO and serves as a DAO for managing Product objects.
QuantityValidator
This class is used to validate the quantities for orders and products in the graphical interface.
StringValidator
This class is used to validate inputs in the graphical interface.
Validator<T>
Interface used to define a contract for QuantityValidator class and StringValidator class
